testsuite.name: Feature: Depositing money in to a User account
Scenario: Depositing money in to an empty User's account should add money to the User's current balance

testcase.name: Given a User has no money in their account
testcase.classname: Scenario: Depositing money in to an empty User's account should add money to the User's current balance

testcase.name: When 100€ is deposited in to the account
testcase.classname: Scenario: Depositing money in to an empty User's account should add money to the User's current balance

testcase.name: Then the balance should be 100€
testcase.classname: Scenario: Depositing money in to an empty User's account should add money to the User's current balance

testsuite.name: Scenario: Depositing money in to User's account should add money to the User's current balance
testsuite.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<100> but was:<200> at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at org.junit.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:834) at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:645) at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:631) at DepositStepDefinitions.lambda$3(DepositStepDefinitions.java:24) at ✽.Then the balance should be 100€(deposit.feature:11)

testcase.name: Given a User has 100€ in their account
testcase.classname: Scenario: Depositing money in to User's account should add money to the User's current balance

testcase.name: When 100€ is deposited in to the account
testcase.classname: Scenario: Depositing money in to User's account should add money to the User's current balance

testcase.name: Then the balance should be 100€
testcase.classname: Scenario: Depositing money in to User's account should add money to the User's current balance
testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<100> but was:<200> at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at org.junit.Assert.failNotEquals(Assert.java:834) at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:645) at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:631) at DepositStepDefinitions.lambda$3(DepositStepDefinitions.java:24) at ✽.Then the balance should be 100€(deposit.feature:11)
